message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a great deal. I'm offering it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, Alice. I'm really interested, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $13,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13,500. What do you think?
